QuestData.Title: Feels Like the First Time
QuestData.Description:
Shepherding the timeways is a dangerous duty.
Though you are not a Timewalker, Ambassador Chronormu believes you will be of great help. But to ensure your safety we must properly train you.
Unfortunately, all our instructors are still missing. I will do my best to help. Let us see how we both do. I know the Ambassador Chronormu is counting on the both of us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Andantenormu and participate in Timewalker training.
QuestData.RewardText:
That was quite unexpected! As you can see, there are many dangers that come with wielding time energy.
I do wish there was time to examine the effects of your little hiccup, but there are more important matters.

Objectives.Objective: Wait for Andantenormu to help restore your personal timeline
